chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: It is reported commonly that there is fornication among you, and such fornication as is not so much as named among the Gentiles, that one should have his father's wife.
items.plainText: It is reported commonly that there is fornication among you, and such fornication as is not so much as named among the Gentiles, that one should have his father's wife.

items.text: And ye are puffed up, and have not rather mourned, that he that hath done this deed might be taken away from among you.
items.plainText: And ye are puffed up, and have not rather mourned, that he that hath done this deed might be taken away from among you.

items.text: For I verily, as absent in body, but present in spirit, have judged already, as though I were present, concerning him that hath so done this deed,
items.plainText: For I verily, as absent in body, but present in spirit, have judged already, as though I were present, concerning him that hath so done this deed,

items.text: In the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, when ye are gathered together, and my spirit, with the power of our Lord Jesus Christ,
items.plainText: In the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, when ye are gathered together, and my spirit, with the power of our Lord Jesus Christ,

items.text: To deliver such an one unto Satan for the destruction of the flesh, that the spirit may be saved in the day of the Lord Jesus.
items.plainText: To deliver such an one unto Satan for the destruction of the flesh, that the spirit may be saved in the day of the Lord Jesus.

items.text: Your glorying is not good. Know ye not that a little leaven leaveneth the whole lump?
items.plainText: Your glorying is not good. Know ye not that a little leaven leaveneth the whole lump?

items.text: Purge out therefore the old leaven, that ye may be a new lump, as ye are unleavened. For even Christ our passover is sacrificed for us:
items.plainText: Purge out therefore the old leaven, that ye may be a new lump, as ye are unleavened. For even Christ our passover is sacrificed for us:

items.text: Therefore let us keep the feast, not with old leaven, neither with the leaven of malice and wickedness; but with the unleavened bread of sincerity and truth.
items.plainText: Therefore let us keep the feast, not with old leaven, neither with the leaven of malice and wickedness; but with the unleavened bread of sincerity and truth.

items.text: I wrote unto you in an epistle not to company with fornicators:
items.plainText: I wrote unto you in an epistle not to company with fornicators:

items.text: Yet not altogether with the fornicators of this world, or with the covetous, or extortioners, or with idolaters; for then must ye needs go out of the world.
items.plainText: Yet not altogether with the fornicators of this world, or with the covetous, or extortioners, or with idolaters; for then must ye needs go out of the world.

items.text: But now I have written unto you not to keep company, if any man that is called a brother be a fornicator, or covetous, or an idolater, or a railer, or a drunkard, or an extortioner; with such an one no not to eat.
items.plainText: But now I have written unto you not to keep company, if any man that is called a brother be a fornicator, or covetous, or an idolater, or a railer, or a drunkard, or an extortioner; with such an one no not to eat.

items.text: For what have I to do to judge them also that are without? do not ye judge them that are within?
items.plainText: For what have I to do to judge them also that are without? do not ye judge them that are within?

items.text: But them that are without God judgeth. Therefore put away from among yourselves that wicked person.
items.plainText: But them that are without God judgeth. Therefore put away from among yourselves that wicked person.
